commitResults.messageBody: Only done for main source file for now.

commitResults.messageTitle: Decompose Pat's messages and add colour
commitResults.messageBody:
Move Pat's greeting and goodbye into their own methods for modularity.

Add colour to Pat's messages to differentiate from the user.

Add ANSI escape character sequences to manipulate the output of the app
for a cleaner user experience. This only works in the native OS terminal.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add add task to todo and list tasks methods
Add mark/unmark task method and refactor task implementation
commitResults.messageBody: Take advantage of OOP and abstract away Task into its own class.
Get Pat to respond more verbosely to improve user expereince.
Add Todo, Event, and Deadline classes for more fine-tuned behaviour.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add cases in Main for subclasses of Task
commitResults.messageBody: Also give usage hints when user types a wrong command.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add text UI testing with redirection

commitResults.messageBody:
- Define "magic" ANSI escape character sequences as constants.
- Reduce levels of abstraction in the main chat loop by extracting
methods to improve code readability and keep to SLAP guidelines.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ANSI escape code constant and move trim() calls
commitResults.messageBody:
- Add ANSI escape code to move to next line (this was missed out when defining these constants in a previous commit)
- Move trim() calls on lines read with Scanner to minimise its usage
Move it outside individual methods out to runChat()

commitResults.messageTitle: Expand say functionality and revert back handling empty arguments
commitResults.messageBody:
- Modify say() ot mirror print()
- Add sayln() to mirror println()
- Move handling of empty arguments back to respective methods

- InvalidCommandException: for when the user command is badly formed
- EmptyDateException: for when date arguments (such as /by, /from, and /to) are not stated

- Created pat.exceptions & pat.types to house all classes except Pat.java
- Update Pat.cmd to only run Pat, not build (build in IntelliJ instead)

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix small bug in response to invalid task number
Fix minor bug in unmark method
Add delete task method and fix minor bugs
commitResults.messageBody: Fix minor bugs in unmark method.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add getters and setters for all task types

commitResults.messageBody:
- Create txt file with format [T/D/E] followed by other fields in each class, separated by a "|"
- Add data directory to .gitignore
- Update runtest.bat

commitResults.messageTitle: Add constructor for Task and subclasses that takes isDone parameter
Change behaviour when no task number supplied to mark/unmark/delete
Extract Ui and TaskList classes from Pat
commitResults.messageBody:
- Ui: deals with interactions with the user
- TaskList: extends ArrayList; contains operations to add, mark, unmark, delete, and print tasks
Deals with loading tasks from the file and saving tasks in the file.
